publications: [{"title":"Winning in Emerging Markets to Drive Growth in the Life Sciences Industry","subtitle":"Accenture Ltd","date":"December 6, 2012","description":"Our study shows that life sciences companies may be able to gain a competitive edge in emerging markets with a thorough knowledge of the six primary issues faced with emerging market growth.By adopting a four-point integrated strategyâ€”think in terms of customer clusters and sub-markets, find cross-border customer similarities, build capabilities that leverage global reach and local relevance, and create effective and rapid execution capabilitiesâ€”life sciences companies can overcome the six primary issues and run a successful market access strategy."}]
